noez.relocator.tooltip1: §6On use: §rBlink to a short distance where you facing

noez.iridescent_bow.tooltip2: §7Iridescent Arrow: Not affected by gravity, pierces through targets and deals True Damage
noez.hellfire_sword.tooltip1: §6Passive: §rSet target on fire. For each target set on fire by this sword, you gain %s bonus damage (Up to: %s stacks)
noez.hellfire_sword.tooltip2: §7Lose all Bonus Damage if you stop attacking for 5 seconds
noez.frostbane_sword.tooltip1: §6Passive: §rDeals more damage to targets immune to fire.
noez.windbreaker.tooltip1: §6Passive: §rDeal more damage depends on your falling distance up to 25 blocks
noez.windbreaker.tooltip2: If your falling distance is 10 blocks or more, inflict §4Armor Crunch §rto target and deal damage to all creatures around
noez.dark_devastation.tooltip1: §6On attack: §rInflict §8Corruption§r to target. If target already had the effect, increase the amplify by 1 (Up to: 5 stacks)
noez.blood_sacrifice.tooltip1: §6On attack: §rDeals small damage to all entities around
noez.mechanical_crossbow.tooltip1: §6Passive: §rReload up to 4 projectiles of the same type simultaneously.
